data.title: Case Study: Rightnow Technologies/ Marketfirst: Rightnow in The Right Spot For Service and Customer Experience
data.meta_description: New Microsoft Word Document - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. RightNow(r) Technologies is a CRM provider headquartered in bozeman, Montana. The company pioneered the concept of a Customer Success Indicator (CSI) in order to measure customer utilization. RightNow has seen 14 consecutive quarters of growth.
data.text: Case Study: Rightnow Technologies/ Marketfirst: Rightnow in The Right Spot For Service and Customer Experience
